backend/main.mo: Defines data types and query functions for games, craftable items, categories, and update status, exposing read-only access to stored crafting game data.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping feature IDs to frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten high-level summaries for various frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, and layout with header and footer for core page routing.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable component displaying a no-results state with icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing attribution text and a link with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, title, and home button using TanStack Router navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity management via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching games, items, and update status from an actor API with dynamic query keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a parchment-themed light/dark UI, including a subtle paper texture.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailPage.tsx: Renders game details with item filtering, category tabs, search, and update status using data from query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/GameSearchPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of games with a hero banner, filtering logic, loading skeletons, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed info for a specific item, including category, required materials, and navigation back to the game.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and extended theme values using CSS variables.
